content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Juan Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Thank you for your interest in the apartment, Mr. Mamani. I am open to discussing the rental price. How much were you considering?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Mister Heine. I'm looking to pay the lowest price possible, given the size of the apartment and my budget as a student. Would you be willing to offer a discount for a long-term lease, say, for a year or more?
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: As a landlord, I am always looking to strike a fair deal. While I cannot offer a discount for the apartment's size, I would be willing to consider a long-term lease. How much are you hoping to pay per month, and for how long are you looking to stay?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Thank you for considering a long-term lease, Mister Heine. I'm hoping to pay around 600 Euros per month, and I'm looking to stay for at least one year. Would this be a deal you would be willing to make?
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Your offer of 600 Euros per month for a one-year lease is acceptable to me, Mr. Mamani. I agree to the price of 600 Euros.
name: Heinrich Heine
